title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees

courseOutline.title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees
courseOutline.description: This course is designed to help remote tech employees become proficient in using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
courseOutline.goal: Help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to what Microsoft Teams is, its purpose, and how it fits into the Microsoft 365 ecosystem.

sections.title: Navigating the Interface
sections.description: Learn about the basic layout and navigation elements of Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Starting a Chat
sections.description: How to initiate and manage one-on-one or group chats within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Using Emojis and Reactions
sections.description: Enhance your chat experience with emojis, reactions, and other formatting options.

sections.title: Scheduling a Meeting
sections.description: Learn how to schedule meetings from within Microsoft Teams including setting up recurring meetings.

sections.title: Uploading and Sharing Files
sections.description: How to upload, share, and manage files within Microsoft Teams.
